page.title: 03Great Revival-5th Jubilee.
page.content: From June 23rd-29th 1985,the Presbyterian Church in Wales celebrated 250 years since the beginning of the Great Revival.{Daniel {Rowland}was the greatest preacher in Wales and thousands travelled to{ {Llangeitho}to hear him preach. Celebrations began on Sunday with a communion service for all the Churches and Chapels in the area.A{play}was performed in{Theatr Felinfach}about people travelling to Llangeitho to hear{Rowland}and throughout the week special{services}and{lectures}were held to commemorate the Revival which started{Methodism}in Wales. The Highlight of the week was an{ {open-air Communion service}attended by over 1,000 people.The singing was led by the group{Pererin}and the Communion was celebrated by the{Moderator of {the General Assembly.}
